1. Take 3/6/10 cups for each team.

 2. Place cups on the two sides of the table on triangle shape.

 3. Take at least 2 ping-pong balls.

 4. Decide which team starts the game.

 5. The aim of the game is to throw the ball to every of the enemy's cups.

 6. Teams throws 2 balls alternately.

 7. Each turn you have 2 shots. If 2 balls fall into the same enemy's cup you got 1 extra shot.

 8. At the end of each turn defenders team has to drink the beer from the cups that has been "checked". They cannot throw before the cups are empty.

 9. When the ball spins around cup's walls the defenders team can try to blow it up. If it works, there is no "check" for attackers.

 10. The game ends when one team has no cups left. Then they lose.

 Have fun!
Which ladder you want to pick?
You need to add at least 2 teams
Group ladder can be chosen for at least 5 teams

1. Split into 2 teams. Everyone get a full beer.

 2. Get an empty beer can and rock/ball to throw.

 3. Place the empty can in the middle.

 4. Each team stands on the line in the equal distance from the can.

 5. One team throws the rock. If it hits and knocks over the can, the throwing team starts to drink the beer. Meanwhile one person from other team runs to the can. Makes it stand and returns to the team.

 6. When the runner crosses the line, the drinking stops.

 7. If somebody drink all his beer, he wins.

 8. If everyone from any team empties all the beers - they win.

 Good Luck ;)
